title: How to Assemble & Use Your Hoover FloorMate
description: The Hoover FloorMate gives you that hands-and-knees clean for all your bare floors without all the work -- and in this fast, easy video, we'll show you how to put the FloorMate together properly and use it to wash and dry your tile, laminate and hardwood

asset.author: Hoover
asset.hookText: The Hoover FloorMate gives you that hands-and-knees clean for all your bare floors without all the work -- and in this fast, easy video, we'll show you how to put the FloorMate together properly and use it to wash and dry your tile, laminate and hardwood floors.
